title: How to Make Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies

steps.headline: Sift and combine the flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda together in a medium bowl.
Use a mixer to cream the sugars and butter together in a large bowl.
Thoroughly combine the eggs, vanilla, and mashed bananas in the butter mixture.
Slowly add the flour mixture to the butter mixture.
steps.description: Mix thoroughly with a wooden spoon and add the chocolate chips in last.

steps.headline: Place spoonfuls of the dough on a pre-greased or Parchment paper layered cookie sheet.
Bake the cookies for 12 to 15 minutes.
Cool completely on a cooling rack.

text: Preheat the oven to 400ºF/200ºC.  Sift and combine the flour, salt, baking powder, and baking soda together in a medium bowl.  Use a mixer to cream the sugars and butter together in a large bowl.  Thoroughly combine the eggs, vanilla, and mashed bananas in the butter mixture.  Slowly add the flour mixture to the butter mixture. Mix thoroughly with a wooden spoon and add the chocolate chips in last. Place spoonfuls of the dough on a pre-greased or Parchment paper layered cookie sheet.  Bake the cookies for 12 to 15 minutes.  Cool completely on a cooling rack.
